subject: Speed Skating
lead_paragraph: J. R. Celski had surgery on his left leg after being injured in a crash at the United States short track national championships Saturday night in Marquette, Mich., but the injury will not keep him off the Olympic team for the 2010 Games.
snippet: J. R. Celski had surgery on his left leg after being injured in a crash at the United States short track national championships Saturday night in Marquette, Mich., but the injury will not keep him off the Olympic team for the 2010 Games.
